name: embed
description: Create an embed and send it in a channel

options.name: channel
options.description: The channel to sent the embed in

options.name: title-url
options.description: A URL to put in the title (requires title)

options.name: author
options.description: A user to put in the author spot (alternative to author-name and author-image)

options.name: author-name
options.description: The name to put in the author slot

options.name: author-image
options.description: The image to put in the author slot

options.name: footer-text
options.description: Text to put in the footer

options.name: footer-image
options.description: The image to put in the footer (requires footer-text)

options.name: image
options.description: An image to put below the description

options.name: thumbnail
options.description: A smaller image that goes near the top of the embed
